name: Lustful Professor
description:
Lustful Professor is an adult-only visual novel. In this game, you are in the role of a university professor who lives an ordinary life. But one day a student comes up to him and asks for help. After that, his life changed dramatically...
In the game Lustful Professor you have to visit the body of a university professor. A student approaches you and asks you to help her. You come home and help her. Fuck a young student in her house! You can also fuck her mom! Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music.
Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!
